description: Variation of condition Nos. 2 (plans) & 9 (visibility splay) of planning permission ref: P0581.16 dated 01/06/2016 to permit retrospective front and rear landscaping and to include front boundary walls and gate
decision_conditions: The application, by way of the excessive amount of front hard landscaping and solid front fencing design and materials, would appear unacceptably dominant and incompatible with local character of the Emerson Park Special Character area, and obscuring vehicular sightlines to the detriment of pedestrian safety, contrary to Policy DC69 and DC61 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD and the Emerson Park Policy Area SPD.

The application, by way of the excessive area of hard landscaping at the front of the site, provides insufficient surface permeability and no detail of sustainable urban drainage systems to manage or mitigate on site stormwater run off, contrary to Policies DC48 and DC51 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD and the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent on 22/4/21.
